Holy shit, what can't I say about this game? Half-Life 2 may be the most influential pc game ever made. If you're considering buying it, just do it. Stop reading reviews and go in blind. Trust me on this, please. 

I know you, random HL2 reviews reader, don't wanna make a blind investment, but you gotta trust me on this. For something released in 2004, this game plays and looks better than some things released today. Take a risk. It'll be worth it in the end.

I finished the game and my impressions are very positive. Half Life 2 is brilliant! It is easy to play and has very addictive chapters. My favorite is highway 17 and the chapter we don't go to ravenholm was the hardest for me because there were a lot of pitfalls and dead ends but somehow I went through it. I definitely recommend this game and it's worth the money.
Older game but still very solid and fun. Valve makes some great games. Worth your time

Half-Life 2 es como Half-Life 1 solo que con una pistola para atacar a todos tus enemigos con basura y un perro robot y personajes que tienen mas de dos caras, no por nada es uno de los mejores juegos de la historia y un gran referente de lo a que inovacion sobre su antecesor se refiere.
Si usas Steam si o si debes tener este juego hombre es cultura general.
